entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
